title: Ultimate timers went completly black after pressing Escape+Tab?
body:
I just played a game of league of legends and i noticed that my league of legends ultimate timers on every allied champion got cleaned at some point of the game. It looked like as if they didn't even skill their ultimate.
I uploaded the moment when it happened to youtube to show further evidence of this bug.

As you can see i press Tab, then Escape and then the ultimate timers of every champion is gone except maokais.
This led to alot of confusion ingame and a strong fight because of this missunderstanding/bug.
